) seed oil, aleurites moluccana seed (kukui nut) oil, persea gratissima (avocado) oil, triticum vulgare (wheat) germ oil, squalane, peg-100 stearate, sodium carbomer, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin, tocopherol.
